characteristic.name: Relative Runtime in a Current Range
characteristic.description:
The Relative Runtime in a Current Range characteristic is used to represent a relative value in an electric current range.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

structure.description: Refer to Electric Current characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.electric_current}
Refer to Electric Current characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.electric_current}
